docs.snippet: The sound stage is a dimly lighted cavern, an unused storehouse piled high with crates and desks and filing cabinets. The television studio is barred shut. The film laboratories and storage vaults are empty and sealed....
docs.lead_paragraph: The sound stage is a dimly lighted cavern, an unused storehouse piled high with crates and desks and filing cabinets. The television studio is barred shut. The film laboratories and storage vaults are empty and sealed.
docs.abstract: History of recently-deactivated Army Pictorial Center, Queens, which produced thousands of training films since '42, recalled

headline.main: Ghosts of Old Movies Haunt Queens Studio

docs.snippet: Muhammad Ali, the compulsive conversationalist, has long been the delight of promoters, publicity men and sports writers on the prowl for quotable quotes. He's like one of those mechanical dolls the gagsters used to make jokes about a few years ag...
docs.lead_paragraph: Muhammad Ali, the compulsive conversationalist, has long been the delight of promoters, publicity men and sports writers on the prowl for quotable quotes. He's like one of those mechanical dolls the gagsters used to make jokes about a few years ago. Wind him up and he talks. But no one ever had to crank up the former Cassius Clay. The words just spilled forth.

headline.main: Sports of The Times; Dress Rehearsal?

docs.snippet: LOS ANGELES, Feb. 11 (AP) -- Ruben Navarro, the lightweight contender from Los Angeles who gained a crack at the title as a last-minute substitute, might prove a rugged opponent for the champion, Ken Buchanan of Scotland, when they meet in a 15-ro...
docs.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES, Feb. 11 (AP) -- Ruben Navarro, the lightweight contender from Los Angeles who gained a crack at the title as a last-minute substitute, might prove a rugged opponent for the champion, Ken Buchanan of Scotland, when they meet in a 15-round bout tomorrow night in the Sports Arena.

docs.snippet: MILWAUKEE, Feb. 11 (AP) -- With Lew Alcindor and Oscar Robertson dominating play, the Milwaukee Bucks crushed the Los Angeles Lakers, 122-88, in a National Basketball Association game tonight....
docs.lead_paragraph: MILWAUKEE, Feb. 11 (AP) -- With Lew Alcindor and Oscar Robertson dominating play, the Milwaukee Bucks crushed the Los Angeles Lakers, 122-88, in a National Basketball Association game tonight.

headline.main: LAKERS TROUNCED BY BUCKS, 122-88; Alcindor Paves Way With 31 Points and 21 Rebounds

docs.snippet: The corporate bond market ran into what was described as "a full-fledged selloff" yesterday, and underwriters gave up trying to find purchasers willing to accept a yield of 6.80 per cent for $150-million of Aaa-rated Southwestern Bell Telephone Co...
docs.lead_paragraph: The corporate bond market ran into what was described as "a full-fledged selloff" yesterday, and underwriters gave up trying to find purchasers willing to accept a yield of 6.80 per cent for $150-million of Aaa-rated Southwestern Bell Telephone Company debentures.

headline.main: Bond Prices Register Decline;; 'Selloff' Hits Bell Issue PRICES OF BONDS REGISTER A DROP

docs.snippet: Only the shorts remain the same. For practically everything else, French and American designers are operating on two different wavelengths....
docs.lead_paragraph: Only the shorts remain the same. For practically everything else, French and American designers are operating on two different wavelengths.
docs.abstract: new French fashions with shorter hemlines and brighter colors compared with Amer styles retaining long skirts and dull colors; illus

docs.snippet: Although Elliott Gould was once a basketball player of absolutely no distinction at Seth Low Junior High in Brooklyn, he has now reached a point where he gets invited to perform against the Harlem Globetrotters and also finds himself on a court fo...
docs.lead_paragraph: Although Elliott Gould was once a basketball player of absolutely no distinction at Seth Low Junior High in Brooklyn, he has now reached a point where he gets invited to perform against the Harlem Globetrotters and also finds himself on a court for a televised showing of a one-on-one exhibition against Walt Frazier of the Knicks.

headline.main: Sports of The Times; Lights, Action, Camera
